Articles.Content:
So, I'll start here: My Gmod freezes directly after loading the main menu, it remains this way easily 5-10 minutes.

next up is that Gmod take 4-5 minutes loading a map(ANY map).

anyone else having these issues?

Oh, and my only other Source game, CS:S, runs fine.

plenty, but I loaded it up today, and it was mostly fixed.

now I'm trying to solve an issue involving pink checkered squares with weapon propeties hovering below me ingame.
You don't have the proper files included with the weapon.

Nevermind, I downloaded some TTT addons, and it repaired it.

horray!
